Tokens.text: I'm black, but people call me mixed because my parents come from two different parts of Africa with different skin tones and hair textures. Did I blow your mind?
So what would make some hair prettier than others?

Tokens.text: Think about some of the reasons why certain hair types may be deemed better by your standards. A lot of times the reason we like certain hair types is because of Eurocentric ideals.
You do realize that you are somewhat implying that African-american hair, which isn't usually deemed as 'soft', isn't as good as less coarse hair?
